articles.description: Fellow first-time honourees also include Hydron Energy, Picketa Systems, Vivid Machines. The post Carbonova, SenseNet, Xatoms among cleantech startups named to latest Foresight 50 first appeared on BetaKit.

articles.title: Scientists find hidden brain damage from a common pesticide
articles.description: Prenatal exposure to the insecticide chlorpyrifos causes widespread brain abnormalities and poorer motor skills in children. Even after a residential ban, ongoing agricultural use continues to endanger developing brains.

articles.title: Friday on My Mind: Léa Pool's On sera heureux is about love more than politics
articles.description: Also: Quebec rock band Vilain Pingouin does one final show, and Louise Lecavalier has a new dance production.

articles.title: Woman in her 90s dies after 14th-floor apartment fire in Brampton
articles.description: An elderly woman has died following a fire inside a high-rise apartment building in Brampton. Emergency crews were called to 2 Hanover Road around 6:45 p.m. after reports of a fire on the 14th floor. articles.title: Cowan: Canadiens goalie Jakub Dobes in tears after 4-3 OT loss to Devils
articles.description: "We played good enough to win," he says after suffering his first loss of season. "Just not good enough from my side."

articles.title: After 250 years, an 18th-century mechanical volcano erupts to life
articles.description: An 18th-century mechanical artwork depicting Mount Vesuvius’ eruption has finally erupted — 250 years later. articles.description: EDGEWOOD, BRITISH COLUMBIA, CANADA — An operation to kill hundreds of ostriches at a British Columbia farm is underway, with numerous gunshots heard on the property overnight. articles.title: Canada adds surprise 67,000 jobs in October, unemployment rate drops to 6.9%
articles.description: Canada’s labour market caught economists off guard with a second straight month of surprise job gains in October. Statistics Canada said Friday the economy added 67,000 jobs in October, good enough to drive the unemployment rate down two tenths of a percentage point to 6.9 per cent. October’s growth
